TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProviderMetadata extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 包含事件提供者的靜態資訊，例如提供者的名稱和 ID，以及提供者中定義的事件集合。

span.span: Contains static information about an event provider, such as the name and id of the provider, and the collection of events defined in the provider.

remarks.format: ## Examples 例如程式碼使用這個類別中，請參閱 < [ 如何： 擷取資訊的相關事件發行者](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2a3e897f-25a9-4dad-8541-171ac49970a3)。For example code using this class, see [How to: Retrieve Information About an Event Publisher](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2a3e897f-25a9-4dad-8541-171ac49970a3).

param.name: providerName
param.span: 您要擷取資訊之事件提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name of the event provider that you want to retrieve information about.

summary.span: 藉由指定您要擷取資訊的提供者名稱，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the name of the provider that you want to retrieve information about.

MemberSignature.Value: public ProviderMetadata (string providerName, System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession session, System.Globalization.CultureInfo targetCultureInfo);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string providerName, class System.Diagnostics.Eventing.Reader.EventLogSession session, class System.Globalization.CultureInfo targetCultureInfo) cil managed
Public Sub New (providerName As String, session As EventLogSession, targetCultureInfo As CultureInfo)
public: ProviderMetadata(System::String ^ providerName, System::Diagnostics::Eventing::Reader::EventLogSession ^ session, System::Globalization::CultureInfo ^ targetCultureInfo);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: providerName
param.span: 您要擷取資訊之事件提供者的名稱。

span.span: The name of the event provider that you want to retrieve information about.

param.name: session
param.span: 物件，指定是從本機電腦上的提供者還是從遠端電腦上的提供者取得提供者資訊。

span.span: The object that specifies whether to get the provider information from a provider on the local computer or a provider on a remote computer.

param.name: targetCultureInfo
param.span: 文化特性 (Culture)，指定應用來傳回資訊的語言。

span.span: The culture that specifies the language that the information should be returned in.

summary.span: 藉由指定您要擷取資訊的提供者名稱、已註冊提供者的事件記錄服務，以及要用來傳回資訊的語言，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by specifying the name of the provider that you want to retrieve information about, the event log service that the provider is registered with, and the language that you want to return the information in.

public: property System::String ^ DisplayName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得事件提供者的當地語系化名稱。

span.span: Gets the localized name of the event provider.

value.span: 傳回字串，這個字串包含事件提供者的當地語系化名稱。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the localized name of the event provider.

summary.span: 釋放這個物件所使用的所有資源。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示會同時釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放這個物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by this object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Events As IEnumerable(Of EventMetadata)

summary.span: 取得可列舉的 物件集合，其中每個物件都代表提供者中定義的一個事件。

span.span: Gets an enumerable collection of objects, each of which represents an event that is defined in the provider.

value.span: 傳回可列舉的 物件集合。

span.span: Returns an enumerable collection of objects.

public: property Uri ^ HelpLink { Uri ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 URL 基礎，這個 URL 是用來形成這個事件提供者中事件的說明要求。

span.span: Gets the base of the URL used to form help requests for the events in this event provider.
Returns a value.

span.span: Gets the globally unique identifier (GUID) for the event provider.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageFilePath As String
public: property System::String ^ MessageFilePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得檔案路徑，這個檔案包含具有提供者中繼資料相關字串的訊息資料表資源。

span.span: Gets the path of the file that contains the message table resource that has the strings associated with the provider metadata.

value.span: 傳回字串，這個字串包含提供者訊息檔案的路徑。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the path of the provider message file.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ParameterFilePath As String
public: property System::String ^ ParameterFilePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得檔案路徑，這個檔案包含具有事件描述中參數替換所使用字串的訊息資料表資源。
